title: The Golden Spoon
overview: Adapted from the webtoon "The Golden Spoon" (금수저) by HD3.An adventure of a boy who stumbles across a magical golden spoon that allows him to switch with the rich parents of another boy. Would you trade your poor but loving family for a life of riches? When Seung Cheon gets his hands on a magical spoon that allows him to switch lives with his rich best friend, he thinks it's a no-brainer. But life-altering decisions are always accompanied by a sense of doubt, and with only three chances to change his mind, Seung Cheon has to decide which of his two possible futures is worth keeping.
